headline: Barclays Lifts Colgate (CL) Target as 2026 Growth Outlook Improves
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 3, Barclays analyst Lauren Lieberman raised the price recommendation on Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) to $88 from $83. The firm kept an Equal Weight rating. The analyst said in the research note that growth in 2026 should look better […]

headline: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) Is Up 11.0% After 2026 Margin Expansion And Brand Investment Guidance - What's Changed
summary: In late January 2026, Colgate-Palmolive reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing higher sales of US$5,230 million but a net loss of US$37 million, alongside guidance for 2026 calling for modest net and organic sales growth with gross margin improvement and double-digit GAAP earnings per share growth. A key detail for investors is management’s plan to expand margins while simultaneously increasing advertising as a percentage of sales, signaling a willingness to invest behind its brands...

headline: Colgate-Palmolive: A Much-Needed Shelter For Returns In 2026
summary: Colgate-Palmolive's high returns in recent months are a direct result of the extremely negative investor sentiment in 2025. Read the analysis on CL stock here.
